ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p:
Imagine how you could change the technology landscape for Apple’s North America Sales team. The Business Process Re-engineering (BPR) team is responsible for implementing tools, strategies, and processes that increase sales efficiency and effectiveness for Apple’s Channel Sales vision. The Web Developer will join a team of technologists and problem solvers in all aspects of designing and building the right solutions for the business.
We are not married to one particular technology stack. In fact, the role is not limited to just web development; we work across Web, iOS, FileMaker, and other technologies. There will be opportunities for a self starter to learn from others, and plenty of opportunities to teach others as well.

ul.li: 5+ Years of Full Stack Web Development

div.p:
As a web developer with the BPR Tools team, you will be responsible for end-to-end creation of regional tools, including the following:
Understand the north America sales technology landscape
Keep up to date with programming trends
Understand how different segments of the Sales business operate
Meet with business stakeholders to understand their needs
Recommend the innovative technology solutions for each request
Design and build back-end architecture
Design appealing front-end UI with intuitive UX
Build and own projects from end to end
Contribute to other team projects
Be comfortable working in an Agile development lifecycle
Present your work to business leaders
Support and improve tools built by the team
B.S. or M.S. in Computer Science, or equivalent experience

Nice to have: iOS Development PHP Python UI/UX Design Responsive design FileMaker
Apple is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer that is committed to inclusion and diversity. We also take affirmative action to offer employment and advancement opportunities to all applicants, including minorities, women, protected veterans, and individuals with disabilities.
